1.label: Siren Alarm Period
1.description: Siren alarm period can be set 10~600 seconds

2.label: Temperature/Humidity Auto Report Period Setting
2.description: Temperature/humidity auto report period can be set 1~1440 minutes

3.label: Sound Playback
3.description: 0: stop to play sound; n: play the n file(n: 1~99)

metadata.inclusion:
1. Put the Z-Wave Controller into inclusion mode.
2. Press the Link button 3 times within 1.5 seconds to put the unit into inclusion mode.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Put the Z-Wave Controller into exclusion mode.
2. Press the Link button 3 times within 1.5 seconds to put the unit into exclusion mode.
metadata.reset:
1. Press the Link button 3 times within 1.5 seconds to put the unit into exclusion mode.
2. Within 1 second of step 1, press the Link button again and hold for 5 seconds.
3. Node ID is excluded. The unit reverts to factory default state.
(This procedure should only be used when the controller is missing or inoperable.)
